summary:
A resourceful professional, offering experience in cost management, contract programme management, contractual administration within complex civil engineering infrastructure projects. Performing as a main contractor applying commercial aspects to ensure project deliverables are successfully outperformed. 
Proven record in working in diverse environments, performing comprehensive site inspections, reviewing documentation to determine client requirements and providing effective driven solutions maximizing project recovery initiatives, along with a focus on applying detailed and analytical approaches to drive significant gains in project profitability outcomes.

certifications.name: Introduction to ESG: Environmental, Social, and Governance

profile_positions.location: Rotterdam–The Hague metropolitan area, South Holland, Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
As a Project Cost Engineer Controller at Shell in Rotterdam, I am responsible for ensuring the successful delivery of capital projects within the Oil and Gas industry. My main role involves tracking and controlling project costs, as well as developing and maintaining accurate project schedules. By doing so, I provide timely and accurate financial data to senior management to enable informed decision-making.

My key responsibilities include:

Developing and maintaining project schedules, tracking progress against established timelines, and identifying potential delays or issues
Monitoring project budgets and actual expenditures to ensure adherence to financial plans and identify areas of cost savings or optimization
Analyzing project financial data and providing insights and recommendations to senior management regarding project performance and risks
Collaborating with project teams, contractors, and stakeholders to identify and resolve issues related to cost, schedule, and performance
Ensuring compliance with project management policies and procedures, including cost control, risk management, and quality assurance
Providing accurate and timely reporting to senior management, including cost forecasts, project status updates, and risk assessments
Supporting the development and implementation of project control systems and tools to improve project performance and reduce costs.
I hold a BSC (Hon) in Construction Management, and have over 12 years of Civil Engineering experience managing revenue and cost. I have a strong understanding of project management principles and tools.

As a member of the Shell team, I am excited to work on some of the world's most challenging and exciting projects, and to contribute to the development of sustainable energy solutions for the future.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer Cost Controller

profile_positions.description: Sourcing, negotiating and purchasing materials. Making payments to suppliers/sub-contractors. Ensuring construction operations fall within tendered allowable rates, generating new rates as variation orders. Project profitability reporting. Setting up measurement systems. Preparing Monthly certificates/invoices.
profile_positions.title: Quantity Surveyor
